plot: Four girls are having a pillow fight in their dormitory. The house mother comes in to stop them, but they turn their pillows on her.
title: A Fight in the Dormitory
plot_es: Four girls are having a pillow fight in their dormitory. The house mother comes in to stop them, but they turn their pillows on her.
plot_en: Four girls are having a pillow fight in their dormitory. The house mother comes in to stop them, but they turn their pillows on her.
